welcome.bottom.call: A better way to build your project, a better way to work in projects
welcome.clientlist.title: Who is using Gitpay
welcome.collab.item.one.primary: Work with collaboration between members, maintainers and clients
welcome.collab.item.one.secondary: Working with collaboration, you can help and support from a community
welcome.collab.item.three.secondary: The open source allow us to work in descentralized and independent projects and we follow this path to provide our deliveries
welcome.collab.item.two.primary: Work with smart integrations and tools
welcome.collab.item.two.secondary: Focus on the task instead of worry about how you will deliver, using git tools and integration the delivery is more efficient
welcome.companies.item.one.primary: Manage the tasks of your projects
welcome.companies.item.one.secondary: With our platform the companies are able to manage your tasks on demand with development tools that suits your needs
welcome.companies.item.secondary: The distributed colaboration helps company grows and provide a great solution to have the tasks solved using agile process and colaboration throught development
welcome.companies.item.three.primary: Develop your business with open source tools, and pay on demand
welcome.companies.item.three.primary.alt: We validate your business integration process
welcome.companies.item.three.secondary: Companies can use the Gitpay for all the development needs, from create a repository until release, paying for concluded and merged tasks that are integrated in your project for real
welcome.companies.item.three.secondary.a: We will help to fit in agile process to have your tasks concluded in an independent way and according to your business
welcome.companies.item.two.primary: Pay for your tasks concluded with a smart and automated development process
welcome.companies.item.two.secondary: You will have different contributors, with wide experience that will help on the development using tools that they are confortable with established processes
welcome.companies.item.two.secondary.alt: Companies will be able to use Open Source if they want to create colaborative tools that will help other companies and contribute with the OSS ecosystem
welcome.companies.title: For companies
welcome.headline.forfreelancers: What we can do for contributors
welcome.how.consulting.main.title: Consultancy
welcome.how.item.primary: Once subscribed you will know when new tasks are available to assign
welcome.how.item.secondary: Clients create demands and they are looking for contributors with different skills
welcome.how.item.three.primary: We validate your change, integrate the code and you receive a bounty
welcome.how.item.three.secondary: Your change goes to test and your solution will be reviewed and once integrated on the codebase, you receive a bounty
welcome.how.item.two.primary: You are assigned and receive all the instructions need to start
welcome.how.item.two.secondary: You get access to repo info with all you need to start and discuss about possible solutions
welcome.how.people.title: How it works
welcome.how.title: How it works
welcome.how.workflow.contrib.title: For contributors
welcome.how.workflow.main.title: Workflow
welcome.howto.item.four.primary: Agile process between business, payment, consulting and development
welcome.howto.item.four.secondary: We want to facilitate the transactions and payment between colaborators and companies by facilitate the development with smart tools, consolidated process already used in agile companies and emerging startups
welcome.howto.item.one.secondary: A new issue, demand, enhancement or suggestion is created on the platform, that represents needs like development, SEO, content, infrastructure or even new ideas
welcome.howto.item.three.primary: Sent a pull request to receive a bounty
welcome.howto.item.three.secondary: A Pull Request is send in the repo and once approved the bounty is sent
welcome.howto.item.two.primary: Your demand is send to our community
welcome.howto.item.two.secondary: Differents colaborators group will be interested to solve this issue for the price invested for that bounty
welcome.integration.desc: Once installed, your issues will be managed by Gitpay, and you can add funds and it will be solved by our community
welcome.integration.subtitle: We can connect your repository to Gitpay by installing our Github app
welcome.integration.title: Integrations
welcome.landing.about.description: GitPay is a new marketplace platform and community of technical talent who work collaboratively to solve issues in GitHub and Bitbucket in exchange for experience and/or bounties. As the future of work becomes reality and distributed, agile teams become the norm, we are poised to support open source and proprietary projects with a ready-to-work community of talent. Visit gitpay.me to learn more.
welcome.landing.about.title: About GitPay
welcome.landing.description: GitPay is a platform by developers, for developers that connects global talent to real-world technical challenges on GitHub and Bitbucket. This allows our international recruitment team to identify the best, proven talent in real time for roles at some of the worldâ€™s most exciting companies, like yours. Want our help filling a position?
welcome.landing.issues.description: GitPay is designed to allow project and product managers to immediately access talent for pressing issues. Have a pressing issue you need solved? Visit gitpay.me to add tasks for bounties.
welcome.landing.issues.title: GitPay for immediate technical requirements
welcome.landing.recruitment.description: We know finding technical talent is competitive and challenging. How? Our co-founders are developers and have worked at major organizations including Dansk Bank and the NeuroLeadership Institute and have solved technical challenges for clients on five continents. We understand the unique requirements of technical recruitment and have built a team of recruiters backed by our platform who are able to identify and help place the best candidate for nearly any technical role. Connect with a recruiter to start a discussion.
welcome.landing.recruitment.title: GitPay for recruitment
welcome.landing.title: A Better Way to Recruit Technical Talent
welcome.main.item.one.primary: Work in projects using the best development tools
welcome.main.item.one.secondary: We use all the Git tools and version control to manage deliveries for our clients
welcome.main.item.three.secondary: Receive bounties for the task you concluded with direct payment when your code is merged on the codebase
welcome.main.item.two.primary: Colaboration with companies by tasks on demand
welcome.main.item.two.secondary: Work in different projects, you can colaborate and learn with many projects and stacks
welcome.pricing.description: Check our options to boost your company deliveries that can fit with your needs
welcome.pricing.title: Princing
welcome.tagline: A worldwide community of contributors working in projects on demmand
welcome.tagline.companies.main.headline: What we can do for organizations
welcome.tagline.headline.how.title: This is our workflow
welcome.which.companies.item.secondary: The distributed colaboration helps company grows and provide a great solution to have the tasks solved using agile process and colaboration throught development
welcome.which.companies.item.three.prima: We validate your business integration process
welcome.which.companies.item.three.secon: We will help to fit in agile process to have your tasks concluded in an independent way and according to your business
welcome.which.companies.item.two.seconda: Companies will be able to use Open Source if they want to create colaborative tools that will help other companies and contribute with the OSS ecosystem
welcome.workflow.item.secondary: Clients, team leads, designers, content creators and managers, everyone can follow the progress and status using already known tools to manage their projects for remote teams
welcome.workflow.item.three.primary: Learn by doing and receive bounties
welcome.workflow.item.three.secondary: Work in different projects and create solutions with distributed teams around the world, using tools that you are familiar and propose solutions for issues that you know. You will be able to be assigned for new challenges
welcome.workflow.item.two.secondary: Beginners will learn for real of how contribute to real companies with real projects, experienced contributors can help with revisions and hard tasks, and is possible to choose projects and tasks that you want to grow or that you are familiar and confortable to work with
